summary: Code executes. Docs just sit there looking pretty. Now it's time to blur that boundary! Tools like the IPython Notebook, Sphinx, dexy, and old-fashioned doctests blend code with docs, making package docs, educational materials, and system-level docs more engaging, relevant, and trustworthy.
title: See Docs Run. Run, Docs, Run!
